text: Ezɨ an a ikaragha ghaze, “Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Gavgaviba Bar Itim, kɨ zurara nɨn ziamra fasa gavgafi. Nɨ fo, Israelia nɨn Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavim abɨgha, nɨn ofa gamir dakoziba akaragharigha, nɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba, me mɨdorozir sabamɨn bar me mɨsoghezɨ me ariaghire. Ezɨ kɨ uabɨra iti, ezɨ me uaghan na mɨsueghtɨ kɨ aremeghasa.”
